reviewText: This film was excellent. Here is an example why European films do not need all the special effects to be good. Its called acting.

An excellent source of Czech films with fast, well-packaged mail service to North America.  Wonderful!  The DVDs are in European format, so you need a multi-region DVD player.  A fantastic addition to Amazon Marketplace!!!

Empties (Vratne Lahve) This is a gentle film about a man trying to come to terms with a new situation in his life. If you enjoyed "KOLYA" you will love this film too. It is full of wry humour. I just enjoyed it so much because it was about real people in real situations. I will watch it again and again.
